experiences.title: Front-end Developer
experiences.description: In this startup the main task was to develop the user interface implementing the SPA(Single Page Application) approach, thus making use of JavaScript's most popular library ReactJS, providing suitable and up-to-date solutions for each challenge

studies.title: Profssional Full-Stack developer
studies.description: This diplomat course is meant to teach its participants to apply and adapt the knowledge in web programming to the single-page applications (SPA) development using ReactJS advantages such as building large-scale applications with data that changes repeatedly over time while also boosting its productivity and making it easy to maintain.

studies.title: Anthrophology

title: Art
description: Since I was a child I've had a deep passion for music and painting, being activities I still do nowadays in my free time. As a Front-end developer, I enjoy using painting knowledge like color theory to easily create layout designs, which are intuitive and likable for the users.
